title: Significant Reduction in CO2 Emissions
description: Ukraine has achieved a remarkable reduction in carbon dioxide emissions, with a decrease of 82.66% from 1990 levels as of 2023.

title: Drastic Decline in Greenhouse Gas Emissions
description: Total greenhouse gas emissions in Ukraine have decreased by 77.69% from 1990 levels, showcasing a significant environmental improvement by 2023.

title: High Military Expenditure
description: In 2023, Ukraine allocated 36.65% of its GDP to military expenditure, indicating a strong focus on defense.

title: Major Share of Government Spending on Military
description: Military expenditure accounted for 58.17% of Ukraine's general government expenditure in 2023, reflecting a significant budgetary priority.

title: Negative Population Growth
description: Ukraine experienced a population decline of 8.42% annually in 2023, indicating demographic challenges.

title: Rural Population Decline
description: The rural population in Ukraine decreased by 9.01% annually in 2023, highlighting a shift away from rural areas.

title: Urban Population Decline
description: Ukraine's urban population saw an annual decrease of 8.17% in 2023, suggesting urban demographic shifts.

title: Low Commercial Bank Branch Density
description: With only 0.39 branches per 100,000 adults in 2023, Ukraine has a low density of commercial bank branches.

title: Negative Net Lending/Borrowing
description: Ukraine's net lending/borrowing was -19.84% of GDP in 2023, indicating fiscal challenges.

title: Negative Gross Domestic Savings
description: In 2023, Ukraine's gross domestic savings were negative, amounting to -$10.36 billion, reflecting economic challenges.

title: Minimal Open Defecation
description: As of 2017, only 0.001% of Ukraine's population practiced open defecation, indicating good sanitation practices.

title: Minimal Impact of Health Expenditure on Poverty
description: In 2018, only 0.01% of Ukraine's population was pushed further below the $2.15 poverty line due to health care costs, reflecting effective health policies.

title: Low Stock Market Activity
description: In 2019, the total value of stocks traded in Ukraine was only 0.00086% of GDP, indicating limited stock market activity.

title: High Import Unit Value Index
description: Ukraine's import unit value index was 226.9 in 2023, suggesting increased costs of imports since 2015.
